Question: SiLC Technologies, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SiLC Technologies, Inc.

Product: Eyeonic Vision System Mini (Eyeonic Mini)

 - Integrates a full multi-channel FMCW LiDAR on a single silicon photonic chip
 - Features an integrated FMCW LiDAR System-on-Chip (SoC)
 - Offers industry-leading range and precision capabilities
 - Demonstrates real-time LiDAR scans with capability to cover record-breaking distances
 - Product demonstrations and private meetings held at CES 2024 from January 9-12
